internetServices.title: Unlimited Internet
internetServices.description: This package includes unlimited Internet use. Internet speed is 15 MB/s download and 1 MB/s upload.
facilities: Consult social networks (Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Twitch etc.)
internetServices.recommand: Recommended for single users and small families.

internetServices.title: Unlimited Internet
internetServices.description: This package includes unlimited Internet use. Internet speed is 30 MB/s download and 10 MB/s upload.
facilities: Smooth, no-wait browsing on the web
Online console and PC games (PS4, Xbox One, PC)
internetServices.recommand: Recommended for digital television viewing and medium-sized families.

internetServices.title: Unlimited Internet
internetServices.description: This package includes unlimited Internet use. Internet speed is 60 MB/s download and 10 MB/s upload.
facilities: Multiple users with high usage and multitasking
internetServices.recommand: Recommended for gamers, heavy users and large families.
